reasoning: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) global average incidence ~5 per 100k person-years. Significant variation by ethnicity (higher in African, Hispanic, Asian populations) and gender (9:1 female:male ratio).
source: Pons-Estel GJ et al. (2010). Understanding the epidemiology and progression of systemic lupus erythematosus. Semin Arthritis Rheum. 39(4):257-268
